sentences.en: A printed checklist was provided, undue haste forbidden.
sentences.cn: 有一张印刷的供核对用的清单, 严禁仓促行事.

sentences.en: Any exercise that causes undue shortness of breath should be stopped.
sentences.cn: 任何导致呼吸出现困难的锻炼都应停止。

sentences.en: De Gaulle felt that America had undue influence in Europe.
sentences.cn: 戴高乐感到美国在欧洲影响力过大。

sentences.en: He had behaved with undue and oily familiarity.
sentences.cn: 他表现得过于亲热，媚态毕现。

sentences.en: He tried to exercise an undue influence upon his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他想对他的同事施加不适当的影响.

sentences.en: He used it to discourage any undue sense of danger.
sentences.cn: 他这样做是为了制止任何不适当的危机感.

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to put undue pressure on ourselves by saying we are the best.
sentences.cn: 说我们是最好的是给自己施加过多的压力，这种做法不切实际。

sentences.en: It might give the Commission undue influence over the coming negotiations.
sentences.cn: 这可能会在即将开启的谈判问题上给委员会带来过多的影响。

sentences.en: It would be wise not to give undue importance to his criticisms.
sentences.cn: 最好不要过分看重他的批评.

sentences.en: Methods of cutting should be employed which are unlikely to generate an undue amount of heat.
sentences.cn: 应采用不易产生过多热量的切割方法.

sentences.en: Mr Bakrie rejects any suggestion that he wields undue influence.
sentences.cn: MrBakrie坚决否认那些他具有不正当影响的说法.

sentences.en: One of these is undue absorption in the past.
sentences.cn: 其一是过分地沉缅于过去.

sentences.en: The kick should be taken without undue delay.
sentences.cn: 应立即开球，不得无故拖延。

sentences.en: The news should be chronicled without undue prominence or headlines.
sentences.cn: 刊载这类消息不应当用过分惹人注目的篇幅或标题.

sentences.en: They are taking undue advantage of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他们过分利用了这种情势。

sentences.en: This would help the families to survive the drought without undue suffering.
sentences.cn: 这会帮助那些家庭度过干旱期，不至于遭受太多的苦。

words.tran_cn: 过度地；不适当地；不正当地
过度的，过分的；不适当的；[金融]未到期的

phrases.tran_cn: 不当延误；不应有的延误
n. 不正当影响；[律]不正当压力

trans.tran_cn: 过度的，过分的，不适当的，未到期的，逾分
trans.tran_en: more than is reasonable, suitable, or necessary
